评论详情: When I was a young one my father took me into the city to buy a belt and it looked just like this one minus the stitches. Beautiful yet funky smelling, fits great and feels pretty solid and durable. I think it's good value. Only got 1 chain but I just wanted the belt anyways. So long and good night.

评论概述: Nice belts for the price point
类型: Color: O-black WhiteSize: Fit Waist Size Under 36 Inches
评论详情: When going for the punk aesthetic, more belts means cooler outfit. But nice belts cost can add up. These are cheap as can be, the leather is poor, the metal thin, and the clasp barely functional.  but they look good, just make sure to keep your expectation in check. these are $7 a piece. They are meant to be decoration, not functional belts. And for that function, they were perfect.
